sentences: She was admitted to the Conservatoire de Paris in 1887 and studied with César Franck and Jules Massenet.

There, she went on to win a second prize for harmony in the class of Charles Lenepveu in 1890, a second prize of counterpoint and fugue in 1895 in the class of Jules Massenet, and finally a first prize in 1897 in the composition class of Gabriel Fauré.
